name: bird momma
description:
You are the bird momma (big yellow ball)

The world (green) is in chaos and constantly moving.

Your kids (purple balls) like to run away if you dont stick with them. 

Pick up seeds (blue boxes) and (worms) as you move.

WSAD = move bird momma

F = Feed worms to hungry kids (blue balls making a noise) 

E = Eat worms yourself. 5 worms gives you a rock.

R = place rock on the ground.

T = plant a tree on the ground if you have seeds.

White circle is a nest. See if your kids can take rest there.
